io.apptik.comm.jus

Interface Cache

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DiskBasedCache, NoCache

    public interface Cache
    An interface for a cache keyed by a String with a byte array as data.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Cache.Entry
      Data and metadata for an entry returned by the cache.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear()
      Empties the cache.
      Cache.Entry get(java.lang.String key)
      Retrieves an entry from the cache.
      void initialize()
      Performs any potentially long-running actions needed to initialize the cache; will be called from a worker threadId.
      void invalidate(java.lang.String key, boolean fullExpire)
      Invalidates an entry in the cache.
      void put(java.lang.String key, Cache.Entry entry)
      Adds or replaces an entry to the cache.
      void remove(java.lang.String key)
      Removes an entry from the cache.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        Cache.Entry get(java.lang.String key)
        Retrieves an entry from the cache.
        Parameters:
        key - Cache key
        Returns:
        An Cache.Entry or null in the event of a cache miss

      • put

        void put(java.lang.String key,
         Cache.Entry entry)
        Adds or replaces an entry to the cache.
        Parameters:
        key - Cache key
        entry - Data to store and metadata for cache coherency, TTL, etc.

      • initialize

        void initialize()
        Performs any potentially long-running actions needed to initialize the cache; will be called from a worker threadId.

      • invalidate

        void invalidate(java.lang.String key,
                boolean fullExpire)
        Invalidates an entry in the cache.
        Parameters:
        key - Cache key
        fullExpire - True to fully expire the entry, false to soft expire

      • remove

        void remove(java.lang.String key)
        Removes an entry from the cache.
        Parameters:
        key - Cache key

      • clear

        void clear()
        Empties the cache.
